name: Hill Construction Contract: Truck Climb N Parking
name_original: Hill Construction Contract: Truck Climb N Parking
description:
Hill Construction Contract : Truck Climb N Parking

Hill Construction Contract : Truck Climb N Parking is a newest construction simulation 3D game that allows you to be a professional construction contractor and start building a city of your dreams.

Driving, Parking, Excavation and Road Construction are provided to all construction game lovers under one roof in this amazing city constructor simulator game.

You are the new builder in town, lay the infrastructure so that people can drive and park easily on city roads & off road. Play as the construction contractor, take up the challenge of ultimate town construction of 2017.

Operate different heavy contractor vehicle and enjoy city building with different mode. Drive bulldozer to clear the old construction point. Use demolition machine to wreck and destroy old houses and roads. Drive and operate excavator to excavate trenches and load trucks.

Key Features :

=> Real Experience of City Road Construction
=> Amazing 3d Graphics & Construction Site Environments
=> Many Various Type of Truck
=> Extreme turns with Easy controller
=> Realistic physics handling with simple touch controls
